description: Course instances that are active within a given date range.

params.name: institution_short_name
params.description: Restrict to a particular institution (blank means all institutions).

params.name: start_date
params.description: Start of the date range (e.g., first day of the academic yaer).

params.name: end_date
params.description: End of the date range (e.g., last day of the academic year).

params.name: minimum_instance_question_count
params.description: Minimum number of modified instance questions for a student to be included.

params.name: minimum_student_count
params.description: Minimum number of students for a course instance to be included.
